mapper.select: select id, platform, message_type, mem_role, mem_no, order_no, content, page_mode, url, event_name, param, event, send_time, create_op, order_supplement_detail_id from order_center.supplement_sendmsg_log where id = #{id}

select id, platform, message_type, mem_role, mem_no, order_no, content, page_mode, url, event_name, param, event, send_time, create_op, order_supplement_detail_id from order_center.supplement_sendmsg_log limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into order_center.supplement_sendmsg_log(platform, message_type, mem_role, mem_no, order_no, content, page_mode, url, event_name, param, event, send_time, create_op, order_supplement_detail_id) values (#{platform}, #{messageType}, #{memRole}, #{memNo}, #{orderNo}, #{content}, #{pageMode}, #{url}, #{eventName}, #{param}, #{event}, #{sendTime}, #{createOp}, #{orderSupplementDetailId})
mapper.update:
update order_center.supplement_sendmsg_log
platform = #{platform},
message_type = #{messageType},
mem_role = #{memRole},
mem_no = #{memNo},
order_no = #{orderNo},
content = #{content},
page_mode = #{pageMode},
url = #{url},
event_name = #{eventName},
param = #{param},
event = #{event},
send_time = #{sendTime},
create_op = #{createOp},
order_supplement_detail_id = #{orderSupplementDetailId},
where id = #{id}
